publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4711 Peter Peacock: Adoption and Children (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Adoption and Children (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Robert Brown*

S2M-4711 Peter Peacock (Highlands and Islands) (Lab) : Adoption and Children (Scotland) Bill— That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Adoption and Children (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Robert Brown
